en.name: Dark Iron Sword
en.passiveDescription: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by {{20//25//30//35//40%}} for 12s.

zh.name: 暗铁剑
zh.passiveDescription: 触发超载、超导、感电、原激化、超激化、超绽放或雷元素扩散反应后的12秒内，攻击力提高{{20//25//30//35//40%}}。
